comets
Class SpaceObject

java.lang.Object
  comets.SpaceObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comet, Ship, Shot
public abstract class SpaceObject
extends java.lang.Object

SpaceObject is the super class for all the visable objects in the game

Author:
Chet Michals
